ObservationSubjectIdentifierSearchParameter

Parameter subject.identifier:token

Searches for observations by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

ResourceObservation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesObservation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ObservationSubjectIdentifierSearchParameter
description: Searches for observations by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}
